parameter.description: Sent if the data is sourced from VForce
parameter.name: in_OpportunityID

parameter.description: Sent if the data is sourced from OSC
parameter.name: in_OSC_Details

assignment.title: ADD Account and Oppty to output

operation.expression: switch($input.in_OSC_Details[1]/OpportunityHeader[1]/Legal_Billing_Entity__c ) case "01" return "GB29-Vistra IE (UK)" case "1" return "GB29-Vistra IE (UK)" case "02" return "GB30-VISTRA IE (BRISTOL)" case "2" return "GB30-VISTRA IE (BRISTOL)" case "21" return "US11-Vistra International Expansion (USA) Inc" case "40" return "IN03-VISTRA INTERNATIONAL EXPANSION (INDIA) PVT LTD_Mumbai" case "41" return "IN03-VISTRA INTERNATIONAL EXPANSION (INDIA) PVT LTD_Indore" case "60" return "SG09-VISTRA INTERNATIONAL EXPANSION(SINGAPORE)PTE.LTD" case "61" return "SG08-Vistra IE PTE Ltd" case "92" return "GB26-Vistra IE Bidco" default return $input.in_OSC_Details[1]/OpportunityHeader[1]/Legal_Billing_Entity__c

assignment.title: Set OSC Input to Working Variable

throwInput.parameter: Input from VForce requires an 18-digit opportunity id; Input from OSC requires structured data containing at least 1 product

assignment.title: ADD Product to output No Quote

operation.expression:
<PO_GetAll_VForce_Product> <Opportunity_ID>{$temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.Opportunity.Id}</Opportunity_ID> <OpportunityProduct_ID>{$temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.Id }</OpportunityProduct_ID> <OpportunityProduct_ProductCode>{$temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.ProductCode }</OpportunityProduct_ProductCode> <OpportunityProduct_CountryIsoCode>{$temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.CountryIsoCode__c }</OpportunityProduct_CountryIsoCode> <Country__c>{$temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.Country__c }</Country__c> <OpportunityProduct_Quantity>{if(util:isNull($temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.Quantity)) then (0) else ($temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.Quantity) }</OpportunityProduct_Quantity> <OpportunityProduct_VForceSalesPrice>{$temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.VForceSalesPrice__c }</OpportunityProduct_VForceSalesPrice> <OpportunityProduct_Name>{$temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.Name }</OpportunityProduct_Name> <Product2_Description>{$temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.Product2.Description }</Product2_Description> <OpportunityProduct_Operational_Start_Date>{date:toDate($temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.Operational_Start_Date__c,"YYYY-MM-DD") }</OpportunityProduct_Operational_Start_Date> <OpportunityProduct_Service_End_Date>{date:lastDay(date:toDate($temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.Operational_Start_Date__c,"YYYY-MM-DD"))}</OpportunityProduct_Service_End_Date> <Product2_Custom_Pricing_Method>List</Product2_Custom_Pricing_Method> <Product2_Frequency>One Time</Product2_Frequency> <SBQQ__QuoteLine_Billing_Frequency>One Time</SBQQ__QuoteLine_Billing_Frequency> <SBQQ__QuoteLine_Billing_Currency>{$temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.Sales_Currency__c }</SBQQ__QuoteLine_Billing_Currency> <SBQQ__QuoteLine_EffectiveQuantity>{if (util:isNull($temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.Quantity )) then ("0.00") else ($temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.Quantity ) }</SBQQ__QuoteLine_EffectiveQuantity> <SBQQ__QuoteLine_Output_Amount>{ if (util:isNull($temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.Sales_Price__c )) then (0) else ($temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.Sales_Price__c ) }</SBQQ__QuoteLine_Output_Amount> <SBQQ__QuoteLine_Custom_DiscountAmount>{ if (util:isNull($temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.discount)) then (0) else ($temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.discount)}</SBQQ__QuoteLine_Custom_DiscountAmount> <SBQQ_QuoteLine_Net_Unit_Price>{ if (util:isNull($temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.Sales_Price__c)) then (0) else ($temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.Sales_Price__c) }</SBQQ_QuoteLine_Net_Unit_Price> <!-- Alternative Currency Fields --> <Country_Currency__c>{$temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.Sales_Currency__c}</Country_Currency__c> <Output_Currency__c>{$temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.Sales_Currency__c}</Output_Currency__c> <Package_Output_Currency__c>{$temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.Sales_Currency__c}</Package_Output_Currency__c> <Product_Currency__c>{$temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.Sales_Currency__c}</Product_Currency__c> <Market__c>{$temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.Sales_Currency__c}</Market__c> <Bundle_Currency__c>{$temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.Sales_Currency__c}</Bundle_Currency__c> <Billing_Currency__c>{$temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.Sales_Currency__c}</Billing_Currency__c>
</PO_GetAll_VForce_Product>

<PO_GetAll_VForce_Product> <Opportunity_ID>{$temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.Opportunity.Id}</Opportunity_ID> <OpportunityProduct_ID>{$temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.Id }</OpportunityProduct_ID> <OpportunityProduct_ProductCode>{$temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.ProductCode }</OpportunityProduct_ProductCode> <OpportunityProduct_CountryIsoCode>{$temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.CountryIsoCode__c }</OpportunityProduct_CountryIsoCode> <Country__c>{$temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.Country__c }</Country__c> <OpportunityProduct_Quantity>{if(util:isNull($temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.Quantity)) then (0) else ($temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.Quantity) }</OpportunityProduct_Quantity> <OpportunityProduct_VForceSalesPrice>{$temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.VForceSalesPrice__c }</OpportunityProduct_VForceSalesPrice> <OpportunityProduct_Name>{$temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.Name }</OpportunityProduct_Name> <Product2_Description>{$temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.Product2.Description }</Product2_Description> <OpportunityProduct_Operational_Start_Date>{date:toDate($temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.Operational_Start_Date__c,"YYYY-MM-DD") }</OpportunityProduct_Operational_Start_Date> <OpportunityProduct_Service_End_Date>{date:toDate($temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.Service_End_Date__c,"YYYY-MM-DD") }</OpportunityProduct_Service_End_Date> <Product2_Custom_Pricing_Method>{$temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.Product2.Custom_Pricing_Method__c }</Product2_Custom_Pricing_Method> <Product2_Frequency>{$temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.Product2.Frequency__c }</Product2_Frequency> <SBQQ__QuoteLine_Billing_Frequency>{$temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.SBQQ__QuoteLine__r.Billing_Frequency__c }</SBQQ__QuoteLine_Billing_Frequency> <!--SBQQ__QuoteLine_Billing_Currency>{$temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.SBQQ__QuoteLine__r.Billing_Currency__c }</SBQQ__QuoteLine_Billing_Currency--> <SBQQ__QuoteLine_Billing_Currency>{$temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.SBQQ__QuoteLine__r.Product_Currency__c }</SBQQ__QuoteLine_Billing_Currency> <SBQQ__QuoteLine_EffectiveQuantity>{if (util:isNull($temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.SBQQ__QuoteLine__r.SBQQ__EffectiveQuantity__c)) then ("0.00") else ($temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.SBQQ__QuoteLine__r.SBQQ__EffectiveQuantity__c) }</SBQQ__QuoteLine_EffectiveQuantity> <SBQQ__QuoteLine_Output_Amount>{if (util:isNull($temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.SBQQ__QuoteLine__r.Output_Amount__c)) then (0) else ($temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.SBQQ__QuoteLine__r.Output_Amount__c) }</SBQQ__QuoteLine_Output_Amount> <SBQQ__QuoteLine_Custom_DiscountAmount>{if (util:isNull($temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.SBQQ__QuoteLine__r.Custom_Discount__c)) then (0) else ($temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.SBQQ__QuoteLine__r.Custom_Discount__c)}</SBQQ__QuoteLine_Custom_DiscountAmount> <SBQQ_QuoteLine_Net_Unit_Price>{if (util:isNull($temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.SBQQ__QuoteLine__r.Net_Unit_Price__c)) then (0) else ($temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.SBQQ__QuoteLine__r.Net_Unit_Price__c) }</SBQQ_QuoteLine_Net_Unit_Price> <!-- Alternative Currency Fields --> <Country_Currency__c>{$temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.SBQQ__QuoteLine__r.Country_Currency__c}</Country_Currency__c> <Output_Currency__c>{$temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.SBQQ__QuoteLine__r.Output_Currency__c}</Output_Currency__c> <Package_Output_Currency__c>{$temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.SBQQ__QuoteLine__r.Package_Output_Currency__c}</Package_Output_Currency__c> <Product_Currency__c>{$temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.SBQQ__QuoteLine__r.Product_Currency__c}</Product_Currency__c> <Market__c>{$temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.SBQQ__QuoteLine__r.Market__c}</Market__c> <Bundle_Currency__c>{$temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.SBQQ__QuoteLine__r.Bundle_Currency__c}</Bundle_Currency__c> <Billing_Currency__c>{$temp.tmp_VF_OpportunityProduct.SBQQ__QuoteLine__r.Billing_Currency__c}</Billing_Currency__c> <Sequence>{$temp.tmp_Counter }</Sequence> </PO_GetAll_VForce_Product>

for $xx in $temp.tmp_ProductCategoryList_DB let $x := list:head($xx) ,$b := list:tail($xx) return <POProductCategoryList> <ProductCode>{$x/ProductCode/text()}</ProductCode> <ItemCategory>{$x/ItemCategory/text()}</ItemCategory> <IsActive>{$x/IsActive/text()}</IsActive> <CreatedDate>{$x/CreatedDate/text()}</CreatedDate> <id>{$x/id/text()}</id> </POProductCategoryList>

throwInput.parameter: Opportunity ID [{$input.in_OpportunityID}] was not found in VForce
